article_text:
SÃO PAULO—Brazilian state-controlled oil company Petróleo Brasileiro SA named Luiz Nelson de Carvalho as its chairman on an interim basis, replacing Murilo Ferreira who is taking a leave of absence.

Mr. Carvalho is a member of Petrobras’ board since May and is the head of the company’s audit committee.

On Monday, Petrobras said Mr....

twitter.description: Brazilian state-controlled oil company Petróleo Brasileiro named Luiz Nelson de Carvalho, as its chairman on an interim basis, after Murilo Ferreira decided to take a temporary leave of absence.
twitter.title: Petrobras Names Carvalho Interim Chairman
